articles.description: With his second album, the rising pop-punk star shoots for the mainstream yet remains a staunch defender of the disaffected
articles.content: Dominic Yungblud Harrison gives a good interview. He talks passionately about hot-button issues: gender fluidity, transgender rights, mental health. He peppers his conversation with attention-grabbin… [+4909 chars]
